section_17_ceo_dir_2026_080_g4_approved.milestone: STRESS Inversion Layer is now CANONICAL. This is a rare achievement: turning a deterministic failure into a controlled economic weapon.

definition.what_is_shadow_mode: Shadow mode is a non-executing observation state where a canonical layer logs signals, tracks theoretical performance, and captures economic data WITHOUT generating orders or allocating capital.
definition.purpose: Validate real-world performance before granting execution authority
definition.position_in_sequence: SHADOW (current) -> PAPER (future, requires CEO directive) -> MICRO (future, requires Board approval)

signal_logging.description: Every STRESS@99%+ equity forecast triggers a log entry

direction_only_roi_capture.description: Pure directional outcome tracking at fixed horizons
captured_metrics: Direction correctness (binary: did price move down?)
direction_only_roi_capture.constraint: NO options data, NO Greeks, NO IV - pure price movement only

theoretical_performance_tracking.description: Calculate what would have happened IF the inverted signal were traded

anomaly_detection_and_alerts.description: Monitor for drift, degradation, or kill-switch triggers
alert_conditions: Hit rate falls below 80% over 20+ samples
Sample collapse (fewer than 5 signals in 30 days)
anomaly_detection_and_alerts.escalation: CEO notification within 1 hour of CRITICAL alert

instrument_projection_layer.description: Synthetic options projections for LINE training
static_assumptions: Fixed IV snapshot at signal time
instrument_projection_layer.critical_constraint: MUST NOT feed back into signal thresholds

no_order_generation.description: No buy/sell orders of any kind

no_broker_connectivity.description: No connection to Alpaca or any execution venue
includes: No API calls to trading endpoints

no_paper_trading.description: Paper trading is a separate mode requiring CEO directive
no_paper_trading.distinction: Shadow observes reality. Paper simulates execution. They are different.
no_paper_trading.paper_mode_gate: Requires 30-day shadow validation with inverted Brier < 0.05

processing: 4. Scheduler tracks t0+1D, t0+3D, t0+5D outcomes
data_flow_in_shadow_mode.output: Direction-Only ROI Ledger entries + performance metrics

prerequisites: No CRITICAL alerts during shadow period
Options Execution Readiness v1 APPROVED (LINE deliverable)
Direction-Only ROI Ledger shows positive EV

shadow_mode_duration.maximum: No limit - can remain in shadow indefinitely

section_18_shadow_mode_specification.principle: Shadow mode proves the signal works in the real world before we trust it with capital. Observation precedes authority.

issue_found.symptom: Hit rate appeared to decay from 58% (1D) to 22% (3D) to 16% (5D)
issue_found.root_cause: Denominator used total events (n=31) instead of events with outcome data

correction_applied.rule: Denominator = COUNT(events WHERE outcome_H IS NOT NULL)
correction_applied.implementation: FILTER (WHERE price_t0_plus_Xd IS NOT NULL) on all hit rate calculations
